TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TraceSwitch extends System.Diagnostics.Switch

summary.span: 提供多層切換控制追蹤與偵錯的輸出，而不需要重新編譯程式碼。

span.span: Provides a multilevel switch to control tracing and debug output without recompiling your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用追蹤參數篩選出根據其重要性排序訊息。You can use a trace switch to filter out messages based on their importance. 類別提供， ， ，和若要測試的交換器層級的屬性。The class provides the , , , and properties to test the level of the switch. 屬性取得或設定參數的。The property gets or sets the switch's . 您可以設定的層級透過應用程式組態檔，然後使用已設定的在您的應用程式層級。You can set the level of a through the application configuration file and then use the configured level in your application. 或者，您可以建立在您的程式碼和設定層級直接檢測程式碼的特定區段。Alternately, you can create a in your code and set the level directly to instrument a specific section of code. 若要設定，編輯您的應用程式。To configure a , edit the for your application. 在此檔案中，您可以新增或移除參數、 設定參數的值，或清除所有應用程式先前設定的參數。In this file, you can add or remove a switch, set a switch's value, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 組態檔應該格式如下列範例所示：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ``` 這個組態區段會定義與設`mySwitch`，而設為 1，對應至列舉值。This configuration section defines a with the set to `mySwitch`, and the set to 1, which corresponds to the enumeration value . > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 2.0 版中，您可以使用文字來指定參數的值。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, you can use text to specify the value for a switch. 例如，`true`如或代表列舉值，例如文字`Error`的。For example, `true` for a or the text representing an enumeration value, such as `Error` for a . `` 這一行相當於 ``。The line `` is equivalent to ``. 在您的應用程式，您可以使用設定的交換器層級，藉由建立具有相同名稱，如下列範例所示：In your application, you can use the configured switch level by creating a with the same name, as shown in the following example: [!code-cpp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CS/remarks.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/VB/remarks.vb#3)] 根據預設，參數屬性會設定使用組態檔中指定的值。By default, the switch property is set using the value specified in the configuration file. 如果建構函式組態檔中找不到初始參數設定新的切換，則預設為。If the constructor cannot find initial switch settings in the configuration file, the of the new switch defaults to . 您必須啟用追蹤或偵錯，以使用參數。You must enable tracing or debugging to use a switch. 下列語法是特定的編譯器。The following syntax is compiler specific. 如果您使用 C# 或 Visual Basic 以外的編譯器，請參閱編譯器的文件。If you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要啟用偵錯 C# 中，加入`/d:DEBUG`旗標設為編譯器命令列，當您編譯程式碼，或新增`#define DEBUG`加入您的檔案頂端。To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，加入`/d:DEBUG=True`編譯器命令列的旗標。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line. - 若要啟用追蹤，在 C# 中的，加入`/d:TRACE`旗標設為編譯器命令列，當您編譯程式碼，或新增`#define TRACE`加入您的檔案頂端。To enable tracing in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，加入`/d:TRACE=True`編譯器命令列的旗標。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line. > [!NOTE] > 這些偵錯和追蹤編譯器參數使用時則不需要隔離的類別。These debug and trace compiler switches are not required when using the class in isolation. 它們只需要搭配或有條件地編譯的方法。They are only required in conjunction with or methods that are conditionally compiled. 如需有關如何檢測您的應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱和。For more information on instrumenting your application, see and . 如需有關設定和使用追蹤參數的詳細資訊，請參閱[追蹤參數](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md)。For more information about configuring and using trace switches, see [Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md). > [!NOTE] > 若要改善效能，您可以進行成員`static`在您的類別。To improve performance, you can make members `static` in your class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新，並使用參數來判斷是否要列印錯誤訊息。The following code example creates a new and uses the switch to determine whether to print error messages. 在類別層級被建立交換器。The switch is created at the class level. `MyMethod` 如果第一個錯誤訊息會寫入屬性設定為或更高版本。`MyMethod` writes the first error message if the property is set to or higher. 不過，`MyMethod`不會寫入第二個錯誤訊息，如果是小於。However, `MyMethod` does not write the second error message if the is less than . [!code-cpp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要設定的層級您，編輯組態檔對應到您的應用程式的名稱。To set the level of your , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此檔案中，可以加入某個參數，並將其值設定、 移除參數，或清除所有應用程式先前設定的參數。In this file, you can add a switch and set its value, remove a switch, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 組態檔應該格式如下列範例所示：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ``` > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 2.0 版中，您可以使用文字來指定參數的值。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, you can use text to specify the value for a switch. 例如，`true`如或代表列舉值，例如文字`Error`的。For example, `true` for a or the text representing an enumeration value, such as `Error` for a . `` 這一行相當於 ``。The line `` is equivalent to ``. 在您的應用程式，您可以使用設定的交換器層級，藉由建立具有相同名稱，如下列範例所示：In your application, you can use the configured switch level by creating a with the same name, as shown in the following example: [!code-cpp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CS/remarks.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/VB/remarks.vb#3)] 當建構函式組態檔中找不到初始參數設定屬性的新參數設定為。When the constructor cannot find initial switch settings in the configuration file, the property of the new switch is set to . 類別提供， ， ，和屬性，以測試的切換參數。The class provides the , , , and properties to test the of the switch. 屬性取得或設定參數的。The property gets or sets the switch's . > [!NOTE] > 若要改善效能，您可以進行成員`static`在您的類別。To improve performance, you can make members `static` in your class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新，並使用參數來判斷是否要列印錯誤訊息。The following code example creates a new and uses the switch to determine whether to print error messages. 在類別層級被建立交換器。The switch is created at the class level. `MyMethod` 如果第一個錯誤訊息會寫入屬性設定為或更高版本。`MyMethod` writes the first error message if the property is set to or higher. 不過，`MyMethod`不會寫入第二個錯誤訊息，如果是小於。However, `MyMethod` does not write the second error message if the is less than . [!code-cpp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified display name, description, and default value for the switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `displayName`參數用來設定的值屬性，`description`參數用來設定的值屬性，而`defaultSwitchValue`參數是儲存為欄位，用來初始化上第一個參考的屬性。The `displayName` parameter is used to set the value of the property, the `description` parameter is use to set the value of the property, and the `defaultSwitchValue` parameter is saved as a field and used to initialize the property on first reference. 請參閱建構函式的詳細資訊和程式碼範例。See the constructor for more information and a code example.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Diagnostics::TraceLevel Level { System::Diagnostics::TraceLevel get(); void set(System::Diagnostics::TraceLevel value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定決定參數允許之訊息的追蹤層級。

span.span: Gets or sets the trace level that determines the messages the switch allows.

value.span: 其中一個 值，指定此參數允許的訊息層級。

span.span: One of the values that that specifies the level of messages that are allowed by the switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要設定的層級您，編輯組態檔對應到您的應用程式的名稱。To set the level of your , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此檔案中，可以加入某個參數，並將其值設定、 移除參數，或清除所有應用程式先前設定的參數。In this file, you can add a switch and set its value, remove a switch, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 組態檔應該格式如下列範例所示：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 2.0 版中，您可以使用文字來指定參數的值。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, you can use text to specify the value for a switch. 例如，`true`如或代表列舉值，例如文字`Error`的。For example, `true` for a or the text representing an enumeration value, such as `Error` for a . `` 這一行相當於 ``。The line `` is equivalent to ``. 當建構函式組態檔中找不到初始參數設定屬性的新參數設定為。When the constructor cannot find initial switch settings in the configuration file, the property of the new switch is set to . 設定此屬性更新， ， ，和屬性，以反映新的值。Setting this property updates the , , , and properties to reflect the new value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新，並使用參數來判斷是否要列印錯誤訊息。The following code example creates a new and uses the switch to determine whether to print error messages. 在類別層級被建立交換器。The switch is created at the class level. `MyMethod` 如果第一個錯誤訊息會寫入屬性設定為或更高版本。`MyMethod` writes the first error message if the property is set to or higher. 不過，`MyMethod`不會寫入第二個錯誤訊息，如果是小於。However, `MyMethod` does not write the second error message if the is less than . [!code-cpp[Classic TraceSwitch.Level Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.Level Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TraceSwitch.Level Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.Level Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceSwitch.Level Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.Level Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnSwitchSettingChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 更新並修正此參數的層級。

span.span: Updates and corrects the level for this switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可由.NET framework 來驗證並更正透過組態檔初始化參數的值。The method is used by the .NET framework to validate and correct the value of a switch initialized via a configuration file. 如果組態檔中指定的參數值未定義的所有追蹤接聽項都寫入一則訊息列舉型別和參數設定為已定義的值。A message is written to all trace listeners if the switch value specified in the configuration file is not defined by the enumeration and the switch is set to a defined value. 如果您嘗試在您的程式碼以設定屬性的值不由定義列舉型別，擲回例外狀況。If you attempt in your code to set the property to a value that is not defined by the enumeration, an exception is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnValueChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 將 屬性設定成與 屬性相等的整數。

span.span: Sets the property to the integer equivalent of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會在內部呼叫時參數變更的屬性。This method is called internally when the property of the switch changes. 方法可確保相關參數的值的屬性會反映新的值。The method ensures that the properties relating to the switch's value reflect the new value.

para.span: 若要覆寫這個屬性，將轉換的字串值屬性為二進位，然後設定屬性。

span.span: To override this property, convert the string value of the property to binary, and then set the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用， ， ，和屬性搭配和發出用於指定的重要性或更新版本的所有訊息的類別。You can use the , , , and properties in conjunction with the and classes to emit all messages with a specified importance or greater. 當屬性設定為最高的重要性， ， ，錯誤處理的訊息只會發出。When the property is set to the highest importance, , , only error-handling messages are emitted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新，並使用參數來判斷是否要發出錯誤訊息。The following code example creates a new and uses the switch to determine whether to emit error messages. 在類別層級被建立交換器。The switch is created at the class level. `MyMethod` 如果第一個錯誤訊息會寫入屬性設定為或更高版本。`MyMethod` writes the first error message if the property is set to or higher. 不過，`MyMethod`不會寫入第二個錯誤訊息，如果是小於。However, `MyMethod` does not write the second error message if the is less than . remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用， ， ，和屬性搭配和發出用於指定的重要性或更新版本的所有訊息的類別。You can use the , , , and properties in conjunction with the and classes to emit all messages with a specified importance or greater. 當屬性設定為，也會發出警告和錯誤處理訊息。When the property is set to , warnings and error-handling messages are emitted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新，並使用參數來判斷是否要發出錯誤訊息。The following code example creates a new and uses the switch to determine whether to emit error messages. 在類別層級被建立交換器。The switch is created at the class level. `MyMethod` 如果第一個錯誤訊息會寫入屬性設定為或更高版本。`MyMethod` writes the first error message if the property is set to or higher. 不過，`MyMethod`不的寫入第二個錯誤訊息時是小於。However, `MyMethod` does not write the second error message when the is less than . [!code-cpp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceWarning Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceWarning Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceWarning Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceWarning Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceWarning Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceWarning Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
